FAQ.q1: How do I book a cleaning service?
FAQ.a1: You can book directly through our website using the order form or by contacting us via phone or WhatsApp.
FAQ.q2: Do I need to be home during the cleaning?
FAQ.a2: No, you can leave the keys or arrange access. Many clients prefer cleaning while they are away.
FAQ.q3: What cleaning products do you use?
FAQ.a3: We use professional, eco-friendly cleaning products that are safe for children, pets, and surfaces.
FAQ.a4: The price depends on the selected service and area in square meters. The minimum cost is calculated automatically.
FAQ.q5: Do you bring your own equipment?
FAQ.a5: Yes, our team arrives fully equipped with professional tools and materials.
FAQ.a6: Duration depends on the service type and space size. Most cleanings take between 1–4 hours.
FAQ.q7: Is there a guarantee on the work?
FAQ.a7: Yes, if you're not satisfied, we will return and fix the issue free of charge.
FAQ.a8: Yes, cancellations and rescheduling are free if made at least 24 hours in advance.
